data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word اللَّهِ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
The word وَلَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: He made a thing, he created/brought into being/existence. He made to be/become/constitute. He made to be in a altered state/condition. He pronounced a thing by a true judgement/decision/legal ordinance, his judgement. Described them as females, pronounced them to be females, He made known/plain, He exalted/ennobled/called/named (as in a nation) He inserted a thing into a thing (Ex: They put their fingers into their ears) He put into the heart/mind, He appointed/assigned/stipulated to give wages/pay/stipend. He set about/began/commenced/commenced/took to/betook himself to, doing such a thing; He persisted, a piece of rag with which a cooking pot is put down from the fire, short palm trees/shoots/offsets.
data.sentence: The word تَجْعَلُوا comes from the root ج ع ل and is associated with the meanings: He made a thing, he created/brought into being/existence. He made to be/become/constitute. He made to be in a altered state/condition. He pronounced a thing by a true judgement/decision/legal ordinance, his judgement. Described them as females, pronounced them to be females, He made known/plain, He exalted/ennobled/called/named (as in a nation) He inserted a thing into a thing (Ex: They put their fingers into their ears) He put into the heart/mind, He appointed/assigned/stipulated to give wages/pay/stipend. He set about/began/commenced/commenced/took to/betook himself to, doing such a thing; He persisted, a piece of rag with which a cooking pot is put down from the fire, short palm trees/shoots/offsets.
The word مَعَ comes from the root م ع and is associated with the meanings: With
The word مِنْهُ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.sentence: The word إِلَهًا comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.

data.meanings: Becoming separated, severed, disunited, cut off or distinctApparent, manifest, plain, clear, known, distinguished from anotherDisunion and unionComing forthSeparation or division between two things (e.g. land)An evidence, an indication, demonstration, proof, argument that is clear, manifest (intellectual or perceptive/perceived by sense), testimony of a witness
data.sentence: The word مُبِينٌ comes from the root ب ي ن and is associated with the meanings: Becoming separated, severed, disunited, cut off or distinctApparent, manifest, plain, clear, known, distinguished from anotherDisunion and unionComing forthSeparation or division between two things (e.g. land)An evidence, an indication, demonstration, proof, argument that is clear, manifest (intellectual or perceptive/perceived by sense), testimony of a witness

data.meanings: (Nun-Thal-Ra) to dedicate, make a vow, warn, admonish, caution, promise voluntarily, offer present. nadhiir - warner, one who informs and averts calamity, who cautions and put one on guard.
data.sentence: The word نَذِيرٌ comes from the root ن ذ ر and is associated with the meanings: (Nun-Thal-Ra) to dedicate, make a vow, warn, admonish, caution, promise voluntarily, offer present. nadhiir - warner, one who informs and averts calamity, who cautions and put one on guard.

data.meanings: go backwards, retreat/recede/retire, hold back/delay/postpone/defer, last/back part of a thing .Another, other, 2nd.
data.sentence: The word ءَاخَرَ comes from the root ا خ ر and is associated with the meanings: go backwards, retreat/recede/retire, hold back/delay/postpone/defer, last/back part of a thing .Another, other, 2nd.
